 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶ֫דֶר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[1Chr.28.11|1Chr 28:11]]</sup> ==chamber, room== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדרת‎</span>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֿדר‎</span> Mordt<sup>ZMG, 1876, 24</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> **\*\***<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is not 'chamber,' but (from √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dwell***) ***dwelling-place, abode, tent***.) — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶדֶר‎</span> [[2Sam.13.10|2Sam 13:10]] + 11 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחַ֫דְרָה‎</span> [[Gen.43.20|Gen 43:20]]; [[1Kgs.1.15|1Kgs 1:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחָ֑דְרָה‎</span> [[Judg.15.1|Judg 15:1]]; [[2Sam.13.10|2Sam 13:10]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶ֫דֶר‎</span> [[Song.3.4|Song 3:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲדֶר‎</span> [[Exod.7.28|Exod 7:28]] + 5 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶדְרוֺ‎</span> [[Joel.2.16|Joel 2:16]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲדָרִים‎</span> [[Deut.32.25|Deut 32:25]]; [[Prov.24.4|Prov 24:4]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַדְרֵי‎</span> [[Prov.7.27|Prov 7:27]] + 8 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲדָרֶיךָ‎</span> [[Isa.26.20|Isa 26:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲדָרָיו‎</span> [[Song.1.4|Song 1:4]]; [[1Chr.28.11|1Chr 28:11]] — ***room, chamber***, usually private, as bedroom [[Gen.43.30|Gen 43:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.15.1|Judg 15:1]]; [[Judg.16.9|Judg 16:9]]; [[Judg.16.12|Judg 16:12]]; [[2Sam.13.10|2Sam 13:10]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.1.15|1Kgs 1:15]]; [[Song.1.4|Song 1:4]]; [[Isa.26.20|Isa 26:20]]; [[Judg.14.18|Judg 14:18]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחַדְרָה‎</span> ***bridal-chamber*** for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחַרְסָה‎</span> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW 1884, 253</sup>, compare [[Joel.2.16|Joel 2:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֻפָּתָהּ‎</span> of bride), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺרָתִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Song.3.4|Song 3:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית אִמִּי‎</span>); of kings (of Egypt) [[Ps.105.30|Ps 105:30]] specifically: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁכָּב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> ***bed-chamber*** [[Exod.7.28|Exod 7:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Sam.4.7|2Sam 4:7]]; [[2Kgs.6.12|2Kgs 6:12]]; [[Eccl.10.20|Eccl 10:20]] other combinations: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּקֵרָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]] = ***cool chamber***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפְּנִימִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[1Chr.28.11|1Chr 28:11]] ***inner chamber***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדרי מַשְׂכִּיתוֺ‎</span> [[Ezek.8.12|Ezek 8:12]] ***his chambers of imagery*** (strike out [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Sgfrom); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> ***a chamber within a chamber***, i.e. an innermost chamber [[1Kgs.20.30|1Kgs 20:30]]; [[1Kgs.22.25|1Kgs 22:25]] = [[2Chr.18.24|2Chr 18:24]]; [[2Kgs.9.2|2Kgs 9:2]] plural = ***store-rooms*** [[Prov.24.4|Prov 24:4]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּטּוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[2Kgs.11.2|2Kgs 11:2]] = [[2Chr.22.11|2Chr 22:11]], i.e. room where beds were stored ([[BDB#Ke|Ke]] [[BDB#The|Th]]); metaphor <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָ֑וֶת‎</span> [[Prov.7.27|Prov 7:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּרְכֵי שְׁאוֺל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדרי תֵּמָן‎</span> [[Job.9.9|Job 9:9]] ***chambers of south*** (where constellations are treasured up, see [[BDB#Di|Di]]; [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]. thinks of proper name of star or constellation); compare [[Job.37.9|Job 37:9]] a ***chamber*** whence comes storm-wind (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּפָה‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַדְרֵי בֶטֶן‎</span> i.e. inner parts of body, only figurative [[Prov.18.8|Prov 18:8]] = [[Prov.26.22|Prov 26:22]]; [[Prov.20.27|Prov 20:27]]; [[Prov.20.30|Prov 20:30]] in [[Deut.32.25|Deut 32:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵחֲדָרִים‎</span> = ***within***, poetic for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִבַּיִת‎</span>, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִחוּץ‎</span> ***without.***
